# History {.unnumbered}

[Karen Adolph](https://as.nyu.edu/faculty/karen-adolph.html) and [Rick Gilmore](https://psych.la.psu.edu/people/rog1_/) co-founded and co-direct Databrary. Databrary was built in 2013-2014 at New York University, and it went live to the research community in 2014.
